metadata.description: Media Protection - Media handling, sanitization (limited cloud applicability) - MAPPED

controls.Name: MP-1-description - Policy and Procedures

details: Develop and document media protection policy and procedures
Establish media protection roles and responsibilities
Define media protection processes and workflows
Create media protection documentation and templates
Establish policy review and update processes

controls.notes: AWS functions support policy and procedures through media protection, access control, and compliance monitoring capabilities

controls.Name: MP-2-description - Media Access

details: Restrict access to digital and non-digital media
Implement automated restricted access mechanisms
Apply cryptographic protection to media
Establish access control procedures
Monitor and audit media access activities

controls.notes: AWS functions support media access through media protection, access control, and compliance monitoring capabilities

controls.Name: MP-3-description - Media Marking

details: Mark system media with distribution limitations
Apply handling caveats and security markings
Exempt certain media types from marking requirements
Ensure markings remain within controlled areas
Maintain marking consistency and accuracy

controls.notes: AWS functions support media marking through media protection, access control, and compliance monitoring capabilities

controls.Name: MP-4-description - Media Storage

details: Physically control and securely store media
Implement cryptographic protection for stored media
Use automated restricted access mechanisms
Protect media until destruction or sanitization
Maintain secure storage within controlled areas

controls.notes: AWS functions support media storage through media protection, access control, and compliance monitoring capabilities

controls.Name: MP-5-description - Media Transport

Document transport activities
Restrict transport to authorized personnel
Implement protection outside controlled areas

controls.Name: MP-6-description - Media Sanitization

details: Sanitize media prior to disposal or reuse
Use appropriate sanitization techniques and procedures

Test sanitization equipment and procedures
Implement dual authorization for sanitization

controls.Name: MP-7-description - Media Use

new_functions_suggested.description: Automated monitoring of media protection compliance and controls
